Stem: Upright, rounded with slight ridges running lenthwise. Densely covered in whitish or occasionally yellowish hairs.
Leaves: Variable, narrow to almost round. Greenish, covered in whitish hairs, with a thicker covering on the underside.
Flowers: Whitish, in elongated clusters up to 10 cm long. With thick covering of white wooly hairs.
FruitSeeds: Very small rounded capsule-like up to 1.5 mm long.
Habitat: Arid areas, wasteland, drainage lines, sandy soils.
